PISTOL.strategy: **A1 Rush**: All 5 players buy armor, rush A1 main with coordinated pop-flashes. Clear quad/default quickly, focus on site control with trades.
**B Rush Upper**: 4 players rush B upper with armor and flashes, 1 player A1 for late rotate. B players coordinate pop-flashes through ramp.
**Ivy Control**: 3 players ivy with utility, 2 players A1. Ivy players smoke connector, take ivy control with flashes. A players create pressure.
**A Split**: 2 players A1, 3 players ivy to connector. A1 players smoke quad, ivy players coordinate timing through connector. Execute together.
**Lower Control**: 3 players lower with utility, 2 players A1. Lower players smoke tunnels, take lower control. Play for picks and information.
**B Default**: 2 players B upper, 2 players ivy, 1 player A1. Play for picks and information. Ivy players smoke connector if CTs push.
**Connector Rush**: 4 players ivy to connector with pop-flashes, 1 player B upper. Connector players coordinate utility, rush A site.
**A1 Fake to B**: 3 players make noise A1 with utility, 2 players position ivy. Once rotations happen, all execute B through upper.
**Upper Control**: 3 players B upper focusing on ramp area, 2 players A1. Upper players coordinate pop-flashes, take B control.
**Anti-Stack**: 2 players A1, 2 players B upper, 1 player ivy. Create pressure from multiple angles. Ivy player calls rotations.

ECO.strategy: **Five-Seven A1 Rush**: Everyone buys Five-Seven + armor. Rush A1 together with pop-flashes. Focus on overwhelming quad player and trading kills.
**Stack B Upper**: All 5 players stack B upper area. Buy upgraded pistols + armor. Play close angles around ramp, use pop-flashes.
**Ivy Lurk**: 1 player lurks ivy with upgraded pistol, 4 players force buy A1. Ivy player waits for rotations, goes for connector picks.
**Deagle Ivy**: 2 players buy Deagle + armor ivy, 3 players support. Deagles take long angles connector/A site. Support players trade.
**Lower Control**: 4 players buy armor + upgraded pistols lower, 1 player saves. Lower players use pop-flashes, fight for control.
**Anti-Force A1**: 3 players buy armor + Five-Seven A1, 2 players save. Force players smoke quad, play for picks, then save.
**Upper Contact**: 2 players buy armor + upgraded pistols B upper, 3 players save. Upper players go for aggressive ramp contact.
**Connector Contact**: 3 players buy armor + upgraded pistols ivy, 2 players save. Ivy players fight for connector control.
**Split Save**: 2 players force A1, 2 players force B upper, 1 player saves ivy. Both sides play for picks, saver rotates.
**Full Save**: All players save completely. 2 A1, 2 B upper, 1 ivy. Play for exit frags and positioning for next round.

HALF_BUY.strategy: **A1 Control**: 3 players buy rifles, 2 players SMGs. 2 rifles A1, 1 rifle ivy, SMGs support. A1 rifles smoke quad, take control.
**Ivy Presence**: 2 rifles ivy, 2 SMGs A1, 1 rifle B upper. Ivy rifles smoke connector, take control. Create multi-angle pressure.
**B Upper Take**: 2 rifles B upper, 2 SMGs ivy, 1 rifle A1. Upper rifles clear ramp, take B control. Ivy SMGs support.
**Lower Control**: 3 players lower (2 rifles, 1 SMG), 2 SMGs A1. Lower players smoke tunnels, take control. Decide upper execute.
**Pick Heavy**: Spread rifles for picks. 1 rifle A1, 1 rifle ivy, 1 rifle B upper, 2 SMGs floating. Play for economy upgrade.
**A1 Focus**: 4 players A1 (2 rifles, 2 SMGs), 1 rifle ivy. A1 players smoke quad, take site control. Ivy rifle watches rotations.
**Connector Split**: 2 rifles ivy, 2 SMGs A1, 1 rifle B upper. Execute A split through connector and A1. Ivy rifles lead.
**Anti-Full Buy**: 2 rifles long angles, 3 SMGs close angles. Rifles hold ivy and A1, SMGs play close. Use utility to isolate.
**Ramp Control**: 2 rifles B upper, 2 SMGs ivy, 1 rifle A1. Upper rifles take ramp control, coordinate with ivy SMGs.
**Utility Heavy**: 2 rifles, 3 SMGs with heavy utility. Rifles take key angles, SMGs use smokes/flashes for team coordination.

FULL_BUY.strategy: **A1 Execute**: Smoke quad + connector, flash over smokes. 3 players A1, 2 players connector. Execute A site with perfect utility timing.
**Ivy Control**: 3 players ivy with full utility, 2 players A1. Ivy players smoke connector + A site, take control. AWPer ivy for picks.
**B Upper Execute**: 4 players B upper with full utility, 1 player ivy lurk. Upper players smoke ramp + site, execute B. Ivy watches rotations.
**Lower Split**: 2 players lower, 3 players ivy to A. Smoke tunnels + connector, execute A split. Lower players come up through lower tunnels.
**Default Setup**: 2 A1, 2 ivy, 1 B upper. AWPer ivy or A1, riflers support. Play for picks with utility. Execute based on information.
**A1 Fake to B**: 3 players make noise A1 with utility, 2 players position B upper. Once rotations happen, all 5 execute B.
**Connector Control**: 4 players ivy with full utility, 1 player A1 lurk. Ivy players smoke connector + quad, take complete control.
**Popdog Execute**: 3 players A1, 2 players popdog from lower. Smoke quad + popdog, execute A site from two angles with coordination.
**Anti-Stack A**: Heavy utility on A1 (multiple smokes + flashes), 4 players execute A site. 1 player ivy watches for rotations.
**Late Round B**: Play default until 30 seconds, then all 5 execute B through upper. Use utility for late round timing advantage.
